summary: This document consists of multiple 30-minute inmate check sheets from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Special Housing Unit for August 9, 2019. The sheets record staff observations of inmates in various tiers (L, NI, ZA J, ZA K, ZA G, ZA H, ZB) throughout the day, with staff signatures for each check. It is a routine prison operations log.

events.title: Daily Inmate Observation Checks
events.description: Routine 30-minute observation checks of inmates in the Special Housing Unit at MCC New York were conducted and documented throughout the day.

locations: MCC New York Special Housing Unit
keyFacts: The document is a set of prison check sheets dated August 9, 2019, from the MCC New York Special Housing Unit.
It shows a structured observation protocol requiring inmates to be visually checked at least twice per hour on an irregular schedule.
The sheets are divided by watch (Morning, Day, Evening) and tier (L, NI, ZA J, ZA K, ZA G, ZA H, ZB).
No specific inmate or staff member names are legibly recorded in the provided text; only staff signature initials are visible.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) evidence set related to the Epstein case.
